attributes.action: Give nhs and caring staff 3 weeks paid leave (funded by government)
attributes.additional_details: To show gratitude from a very grateful nation for all of the hard work they have put in under very stressful times
attributes.background: I think the government should fund a period of 3 weeks paid leave for nhs and care home workers when the current crisis has subsided/got under control. It would be a nice way to show how thankful the country is for all the hard work and dedication shown during the last 12 months & into the future

rejection.details:
The NHS and social care employers are responsible for decisions about annual leave, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495
